Inside the fast rise and faster collapse of the acclaimed Auckland K Road restaurant Cotto https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/inside-the-fast-rise-and-faster-collapse-of-the-acclaimed-auckland-k-road-restaurant-cotto/ML63HFNF7RDFPPDV4U4QDNEIF4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/lifestyle/inside-the-fast-rise-and-faster-collapse-of-the-acclaimed-auckland-k-road-restaurant-cotto/ML63HFNF7RDFPPDV4U4QDNEIF4/ Stewart Sowman-LundThe popular spot closed its doors with no warning in late 2023. The hugely popular, and critically lauded, Karangahape Road pasta bar had been heading into the busy pre-Christmas period when its doors suddenly shut. Photo / Babiche Martens
